column1: Praying for a swift recovery for our President @realDonaldTrump @FLOTUS and everyone fighting #coronavirus.
ICYMI - Early data shows little evidence COVID-19 is spreading inside grade schools — rates of infection far below what’s found in the surrounding communities. https://t.co/QVTId2XucS

HEARTBREAKING  – Military suicides increased as much as 20% this year. The outbreak of COVID-19 and subsequent government-ordered lockdowns have placed tremendous stress on all of us.   As National Suicide Prevention Month comes to end it’s clear our work is far from over. https://t.co/YiWbEk7nT8

Thank you Kelly and @NHPCO_news for zooming with me today and updating me on how the COVID-19 pandemic continues to impact patients and hospice providers in our communities. As always it was great to see you! https://t.co/cWESP5IAoP

Great to virtually meet with the Assoc. of Equipment Manufacturers (@aemadvisor). These great folks support over 96000 jobs in PA and contribute $9.9 billion to our state economy. Together we must support the industry and all businesses impacted from the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/N6RP1E2VEB

Gov. Wolf continues to hide and obfuscate data on his failure to protect Seniors during the COVID-19 pandemic.   The @TheJusticeDept was justified in stepping in to bring desperately needed transparency and truth for our Seniors and their loved ones.  https://t.co/FY7COUelzM

Great News! The U.S. jobless rate fell sharply to 8.4% in August down from 10.2% in July and a peak of 14.7% in April – this is the fourth straight month of job additions in the U.S. economy.   As Americans safely return to work our economy continues to recover from COVID-19. https://t.co/C3fPtMnFEQ

If you received a positive test and since recovered from COVID please consider donating today. Find a plasma donation center at https://t.co/pdZSGBwcbJ https://t.co/kEoNgXfjIE

A study conducted by a University of Wisconsin health researcher on 3000 students found that 65% reported anxiety symptoms and 68% reported mild to severe depression during the Spring 2020 school closure due to COVID-19. https://t.co/vAOX7L8QBc
Germany’s largest study to date on schoolchildren concluded that they don’t play a major role in spreading COVID-19; instead “children act more as a brake on infection” https://t.co/1siy9EWiiG

Schools provide our children with essential learning and development we can’t jeopardize their growth by continuing to require that they learn from home. While we continue to fight COVID-19 we can work responsibly to safely open our schools and daycares. https://t.co/XTU918VS0q

The spirit of Pennsylvania shines bright in this story. We’re in the fight against #COVID19 together and it’s great to see Christmas City Spirits and many of our local businesses shift production to selflessly serve our communities when they are in need.  https://t.co/O0KLaC2zwx

At a time when our Nation is depending on medical research & innovation to overcome COVID-19 the House shouldn't be voting on legislation that will result in fewer cures and treatments coming to market.    Today’s vote on H.R. 1425 was exactly that.

We've lost 4500 Pennsylvania Seniors to COVID-19 and their grieving families deserve answers as to why Gov. Wolf contravened federal guidance and endangered their loved ones.   I sent a letter with @SelectGOP to ask PA AG Shapiro to open an investigation immediately. https://t.co/4r9CctSnM3

I’m in Washington today for a @TransportGOP hearing on the impacts of COVID-19 on transportation workers. This is yet another example of the important work Congress should be present for and doing on behalf of the American People. Tune in at 1:00pm: https://t.co/fkZsXroFDs

Today the House is voting on the HEROES Act which is more about politics than coronavirus. Speaker Pelosi is not allowing Members of Congress – elected to represent our districts – to debate amend or have any input into this $3 trillion bill. This is a disgrace.

.@realDonaldTrump is supporting all Pennsylvanians during the outbreak of #COVID19.   - 2.6M N-95 masks - 18M surgical & procedural masks - 9.4M isolation & surgical founds - 470M medical gloves - $301M in testing assistance funding - $21.4B in loans to 150000 small businesses

I’m honored to welcome President Trump to Pennsylvania today. @realDonaldTrump is helping PA win the fight against #COVID19 with leadership and action – providing huge shipments of PPE testing kits and critical supplies. We can defeat COVID-19 and protect our freedoms.

I need to hear from you. As we continue our fight against COVID-19 what concerns you most? Should businesses be allowed to reopen with health and safety precautions – or is it too soon? Let me know what you think by taking PA-10’s COVID-19 Survey here: https://t.co/EkRW7FiMAR https://t.co/GfFZ5Mo3SI

House Democrats are once again using the #COVID19 crisis to play politics. Today @SpeakerPelosi unveiled an 1815 page liberal wishlist that was written behind closed doors and spends $3 TRILLION. The American People deserve better.

Last month 20.5 million Americans lost their jobs. Since the start of #COVID19 33.3 million Americans have filed for unemployment. Our families and communities are hurting - bad. With precaution we must start moving forward and getting back to work.

The CCP’s lies cover-ups and overall abhorrent response to the COVID-19 pandemic is nothing new for this oppressive deceiving regime. America must step up and hold the CCP accountable. Thanks @MariaBartiromo for the discussion this morning. https://t.co/1C6fpyXBPg

It'll be months until our Nation can eliminate the threat of COVID-19 but with scientific guidance common sense and appropriate measures we can start planning to reopen our Country. @realDonaldTrump is headed in the right direction. @GovernorTomWolf let's get PA back to work.
